name: Watch You're STEP! (Demo, For Bitsy Jam)
name_original: Watch You're STEP! (Demo, For Bitsy Jam)
description:
A game I will be making. All the things in here will not be in the full version.

The TTSS (Totally Testing Snails Safely) made a base somewhere in Snailpolus, a Planet that has intelligent snails. You are a Subject, or what they call "Contestant" now find ur way out of dis prison
